channel.title: How do i make like a help menu? sort of comes a window with stuff written on it?

item.title: How do i make like a help menu? sort of comes a window with stuff written on it?
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

if(command.startsWith("gay") && (playerRights >= 2)) { String name = command.substring(4); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.sendQuest("@dre@Please Read", 8144); //Title c.clearQuestInterface(); c.sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ "+playerName+" Found you being gay...@dre@", 8145); c.sendQuest("@dbl@Plz Read the following", 8147); c.sendQuest("@dbl@", 8148); c.sendQuest("@dbl@Please stop being gay ASAP", 8149); c.sendQuest("@dbl@or gay shall be quarantined!", 8150); c.sendQuest("@dbl@to pervent spread of gayness disease", 8151); c.sendQuest("@dbl@Visit http://www.Liquid-Reality.tk/ for a non-gay site!", 8152); c.sendQuest("@dbl@", 8153); c.sendQuest("@dbl@Remember try to handle ur horney meter TY", 8154); c.sendQuest("@dbl@Yes if you act too immature or gay you be banned!,", 8155); c.sendQuest("@dbl@Thanks, @dre@The Tos-scape Team@dre@", 8156); c.sendQuestSomething(8143); c.showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } Something like this…?
